name: How To Train Your Chicken
description:
How To Train Your Chicken - 

In this tutorial we are going to talk about training domesticated laying hens, that are already in an established flock. There is a lot of advanced training you can do, and we are going to start with the foundation that allows you to build up to them. 

Why train?

Training reduces stress in domesticated animals and animals living in captivity.  A chicken’s stress levels are directly related to their well being and in turn, their quality of egg production.  This means better lives for them and better eggs for you.

Never Trained Before?

Chickens are a great animal to start training with as compared to cats or dogs, because they are almost solely food motivated. This tutorial comes with lots of information and tips on how to start training successfully. It also has a Virtual Coop with your own virtual chicken to test your understanding.
